meanings.definition: A highly toxic chemical warfare agent.
meanings.sent1: Soldiers must protect themselves from the deadly yperite during battle.
meanings.sent2: The yperite leaked from the container, causing a hazardous situation.
meanings.sent3: The villain in the movie planned to use yperite to create chaos in the city.
meanings.sent4: The yperite spread through the air like a silent killer, affecting all in its path.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of yperite served as a warning of its danger.

meanings.sent1: Careless handling of the chemical can yperite innocent civilians.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers were trained on how to yperite the enemy forces.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous prankster decided to yperite his friend during a water balloon fight.
meanings.sent4: Her words seemed to yperite his deepest fears, causing him to rethink his choices.
meanings.sent5: The news of the impending storm seemed to yperite a sense of urgency among the residents.
